alert.note: Alert for Northern Monterey Bay; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 05 at 7:01AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Santa Cruz County through 745 AM PST... At 701 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Capitola, or near Santa Cruz, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Cruz, Corralitos, Capitola, Live Oak, Aptos, Twin Lakes, Opal Cliffs, Eureka Canyon Road, Rio Del Mar, Soquel, Brown Valley Road, Aptos Hills-Larkin Valley, Aptos Hills-Larkin and Day Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Monterey Bay; Santa Cruz Mountains
